name: Dice Rush
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

You are a dice and must get to the end of the level. However, in most levels, your movements are completely random. However, to counteract this, you can use a safe move so your next move is guaranteed to be what you select, but you only have a limited quantity of them. Can you get to the end?

Controls:

  • Use the arrow keys to move.
  • Press space to use a safe move.

Mechanics:

  • Every level changes what numbers you can roll, look at the top left to see what numbers you can roll. For example, if it says 1-3, you can roll a 1, 2, or 3.
  • You get safe rolls throughout the game. If you use a safe roll with the number 1, you are  guaranteed to move 1 space on your next move. You sometimes start with safe moves, and other times you have to collect them.
  • If you move off the ground you lose immediately.
  • At some point you will encounter spikes. Passing through them is fine, but if you land on one, it's over.
  • You will eventually encounter speed goo. If you land on it, you will move double the normal amount on your next move.

Credits:

  • A.J.: Code, Art.
  • Shawn: Music.
  • The name was generated by Game Name Generator.
  • The font is Raleway Medium and made by The League of Moveable Type.
